mapper.select: SELECT t3.course_id,t3.course_name, t1.last_stamp as last_stamp, t3.structure_id,t3.teacher, t3.play_num,t3.duration, t3.sequence,t3.`status`, t1.create_date as create_date, t3.cover FROM tb_history t1 RIGHT JOIN (SELECT course_id,max(create_date) create_date FROM tb_history GROUP BY course_id) t2 ON t1.course_id = t2.course_id AND t1.create_date = t2.create_date LEFT JOIN tb_course t3 ON t1.course_id = t3.course_id WHERE t1.create_by = #{userId} AND t1.is_valid = ${0} ORDER BY t1.create_date DESC LIMIT #{num}
